title: KSI vs Logan Paul LIVE press conference: YouTube stars clash in UK ahead of rematch
text:
KSI and Logan Paul will come face-to-face in London on Monday ahead of their eagerly-anticipated rematch.

The YouTube stars will be back in the ring next month following their initial fight in Manchester in August 2018.

That bout ended in a draw and both fighters have since turned pro, and will now go head-to-head at the Staples Center in LA.

Fight night is scheduled for November 9 but there will be plenty of words exchanged before then.

All eyes are on London on Monday as the countdown to the showdown continues.

Follow all the action from the press conference at the Troxy in London.
description: The YouTube stars drew in their first fight in Manchester in August 2018 and will now face off in the States next month
